full_text: The wild swings of the hand sanitizer market: Last year, people were so desperate to get hand sanitizer that distilleries started making it. Now stores are having a hard time getting rid of it. https://t.co/VX5IjHi7E1

localize.full_text: 手指消毒剤市場の乱高下 昨年、人々は手指消毒剤を手に入れようと必死になり、蒸留所が手指消毒剤を作り始めました。今ではお店が処分に困っています。https://t.co/VX5IjHi7E1
